titles.title: To amend subchapter IV of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for wage parity for prevailing rate employees in Guam.
To amend subchapter IV of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for wage parity for prevailing rate employees in Guam.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: Directs the Office of Personnel Management to establish wage schedules and rates for prevailing rate employees who are U.S. citizens employed in Guam that are the same as the wages schedules and rates for such employees in Hawaii.
